report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Zoom products Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Zoom products Vulnerabilities
text: Multiple Zoom products could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a flaw in the installer repair operation. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges or delete system level files or folders
